participant_1.background:
My family members are all very supportive of my small business, and I am grateful for their help.
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
I love going on YouTube to watch video tutorials for my online classes and to find new recipes to cook for my family.
i am a cheerleader.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm moving to a new city tomorrow to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
That sounds awesome! I'm sure you'll be happy there.
I hope so! I love my family and they're all very supportive of my small business, so I'm grateful for their help.
That's great to hear! I'm glad you have a supportive family.
Yeah, I'm really lucky. What about you? Are you close to your family?
I'm not as close to my family as I'd like to be. I'm trying to make more of an effort to be there for them, though.
That's good! I'm sure they'd appreciate it.
Thanks! I'm also going to school to get my bachelors degree.
Oh, that's great! What are you studying?
Nice! I love business. I'm an upholsterer and I've been commissioned by comic book artists to do some work for them.
That's so cool! I'm sure it's a lot of fun.
It is! I love working with my hands and creating things.
Me too! I'm glad you're happy with your job.
Thanks! I am. I'm also really excited about moving to my new city.
